text:
Donald Trump sold out people when he passed a tax bill benefitting the top 1%.

He sold out our values when he started putting babies in cages in the name of border security.

He sold out our country when he took Putin's word over our intelligence community.

Dude gotta go.

Hey everyone, I think I figured out how we’re going to pay for it ⬇️ https://twitter.com/dleonhardt/status/1180990667700477952 QT @DLeonhardt Last year, for the first time on record, the 400 wealthiest Americans paid a lower total tax rate than any other income group.  https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2019/10/06/opinion/income-tax-rate-wealthy.html

We continue to break records as our planet gets hotter and hotter. We need urgent action now to end the climate crisis. https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2019/10/04/global-warming-september-2019-hottest-record/3865898002/

RT @davidfrum As @anneapplebaum says: "After this is all over, I never, ever want to hear again about how businessmen would run the government better than politicians." https://twitter.com/davidfrum/status/1180456813285777409 QT @davidfrum The Ukraine scandal is also a story of how successful  businessman assumed that he was an expert on everything, forced his way into topics he did not understand, pulled upon him the biggest trouble of his life - and probably got his president impeached https://www.washingtonpost.com/national-security/holding-ukraine-hostage-how-the-president-and-his-allies-chasing-2020-ammunition-fanned-a-political-storm/2019/10/04/100e9868-e6a5-11e9-a331-2df12d56a80b_story.html

This week, a court sent a clear message that state and local governments can continue to lead to protect #NetNeutrality — just as California has done. I’ll continue to fight to protect the free and open internet for everyone.

We cannot have a truly democratic society with so little power in the hands of working people. We cannot have sustained and inclusive economic growth without a stronger labor movement. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGOf25wXUAMocQE.png

A 100% carbon-neutral economy, millions of good-paying jobs, and a guaranteed right to clean air, water, and soil for all Americans—the time to act is now. Learn more about my plan to get there: https://corybooker.com/climate

I am glad to be home in Burlington to rest for a little bit. I want to thank all of you for your well wishes, love, and support over the week. I am recovering well and feeling much better. 

I am more determined than ever to fight alongside you to make health care a human right.

It’s not a joke. Release the transcripts and memos of Trump’s calls with China. 
https://twitter.com/atrupar/status/1180871476116889601 QT @atrupar Rep @Jim_Jordan claims on This Week that Trump was just joking when he asked China and Ukraine to investigate the Bidens. Trump absolutely was not joking. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1180871261649559554/pu/img/yu9vW8_MGO1Ywde5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1180871261649559554/pu/vid/480x270/PAInmPvS7_TcsYcm.mp4?tag=10

Jessye Norman’s voice was a gift. Her passing last week is a monumental loss to the world. May she rest in peace. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1178860178596339713/pu/img/l1q5BttIwKkvWg0Q.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1178860178596339713/pu/vid/320x320/jliul3gZQ3i7YT7z.mp4?tag=10

Civil rights activist Sylvia Mendez was one of the first students of Mexican descent to attend an all-white school in California. She represents the best of who we are and her bravery should serve as an inspiration to all. #HispanicHeritageMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGN8SiNX0AEYCvN.jpg

(I love how GOP pundits are already saying “it’s not enough to pay for it!” even though “it” isn’t even defined in the tweet 😉

It’s almost as if regardless of the circumstance, the GOP take is: “Whatever you’re talking about, don’t tax the rich - no matter what!”)

Passing Medicare for All and eliminating all past-due medical debt is not only our moral obligation. It is economically necessary. https://twitter.com/business/status/1178776326892859394 QT @business Medical debts are more likely than other kinds to get in the way of Americans trying to buy or rent a home https://trib.al/J0CtKma

Here’s my promise to America’s public school teachers—I’ll appoint a Secretary of Education who has been a public school teacher. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGNfCEpX0AE7lG8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1180891364646629382/vid/480x270/iTjtxbwAiWW-rjBc.mp4?tag=13

There are 17,000 federal prisoners who are unjustly incarcerated today. If I am your president, I will give a pathway to liberation the first week I’m in office. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1180870860086882304/img/4fRlC37dXBAFIJus.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1180870860086882304/vid/320x320/Q2Rp3EAvHDF3YIu9.mp4?tag=13

RT @Public_Citizen .@AOC thinks concentrated wealth is incompatible with democracy. So did our founders. It's time to #TaxTheRich.

RT @CarmenYulinCruz Thank you New Hampshire for continuing the fight towards allowing people to have a chance to have a good quality of life. This agenda is for the 99%. You are definitely “feeling the Bern” ¡Sí se puede! @BernieSanders @Latinos4Bernie http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGMpl-XWsAAWZm1.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGMpl-WWwAMv3OT.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGMpl-lWoAAkBFs.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGMpl-oXkAALKpY.jpg

Trump's vision of government is one that serves the rich and attacks the poor. We have a different idea. We are going to protect the programs that are life-and-death for millions of working people and make the wealthy pay their fair share. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1180214778477907971 QT @nytimes The Trump administration has moved to cut funding to the U.S. food stamps program for the 3rd time. The latest proposed cut would slice $4.5 billion from the program over 5 years, trimming monthly benefits by as much as $75 for 1 in 5 struggling families. https://trib.al/yAly4d3

RT @CNN “The Republican party has got to get a grip on itself,” Former Secy. of State Colin Powell on the state of the current GOP. “Republican leaders and members of the Congress… are holding back because they’re terrified of what will happen [to] any one of them if they speak out." http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGNbZN8XUAEG2VH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1180887169570951168/vid/480x270/82jdDIND_YeixyVp.mp4?tag=13
We’re better than this; human rights shouldn’t be for sale & the NBA shouldn’t be assisting Chinese communist censorship.

Americans continue to be shot and killed, while Mitch McConnell refuses to bring a gun safety vote to the floor.
https://twitter.com/nbcnews/status/1180776672007774213 QT @NBCNews JUST IN: Four people were killed after a suspect entered a Kansas City bar and started shooting, police said Sunday. https://nbcnews.trib.al/OWTBmd6

Just when we caught a glimpse of justice for Botham Jean, much of it feels stolen back with the murder of Joshua Brown, a key witness in the case.

My heart breaks for his family and for everyone touched by this tragedy. We must get to the bottom of this injustice. https://twitter.com/breznican/status/1180636451811119104 QT @Breznican Joshua Brown was the neighbor of Botham Jean and the key witness in the case of a police officer who killed him in his own apartment.

Just days after her conviction, he is mysteriously murdered. As he feared he would be.

What is this. https://www.dallasnews.com/news/crime/2019/10/05/man-fatally-shot-apartment-complex-near-dallas-medical-district-suspect-loose/

Assemblymember @wendycarrillo immigrated to the United States as a young child during El Salvador’s Civil War. She's spent her career fighting for equality and fairness for those who need a voice in our political system. Honored to have her on our team as we fight #ForThePeople. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGOxKXwW4AESFAh.jpg

Brett Kavanaugh was confirmed to the Supreme Court one year ago today—and his seat on the Court remains a national travesty. Read my op-ed on why I’ve called for an impeachment inquiry into Kavanaugh. https://www.elle.com/culture/career-politics/a29209992/equal-justice-under-the-law-prove-it-investigate-kavanaugh/?utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=socialflowTWELM&utm_medium=social-media

Since the Trump admin is hamstringing the Census, we’re stepping in ourselves.

Our organizing must go beyond elections. If you have friends or family intimidated about answering next year’s Census, start talking to them NOW.

The stakes are way too high.
#CountMeIn #Cuéntame http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGNoQxWX0AEslNt.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGNoQxZWwAUzDDZ.jpg

RT @shaunking Wow. Just wow.

This is the single best, most insightful, most inspirational campaign ad of the 2020 presidential election.

Thank you to @0rf for not only showing the world how kind and compassionate @BernieSanders is, but showing just how far off base coverage about him can be. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGCUnXBWsAE1sMw.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1180105201723809793/vid/480x270/h_0H9fLuIQFherPh.mp4?tag=13
Maybe I'm old fashioned. But I believe we should have a president who believes in the United States Constitution.

I'm heartsick for Joshua Brown's family and friends. He bravely stepped forward and testified to bring some justice for Botham Jean, and peace for his family. We need answers—and Joshua Brown and his family need justice.
https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2019/10/06/witness-ex-dallas-officer-amber-guygers-murder-trial-killed-shooting-lawyer-says/

Even billionaires are saying billionaires shouldn’t exist.

I wonder if extreme-wealth worshippers will listen to the point now that those with extreme wealth are saying it, too? https://twitter.com/business/status/1180298520298950656 QT @business Mark Zuckerberg agrees with Bernie Sanders that billionaires probably shouldn't exist, but says he's trying to make his billionaire status useful https://trib.al/FARke9A http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGFDP6UWoAE414G.png

RT @CHIRLA What the line looked like outside CHIRLA today. Lots of folks renewing #DACA. Where were YOU? If your #DACA expires soon, renew now. Info: http://daca.chirla.org. @FWDus #RiseUpForDACA b/c #HomeIsHere http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1180538886918815746/pu/img/x49SZjvlEYFw72mp.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1180538886918815746/pu/vid/480x270/efKn85W_8Ze6jaF3.mp4?tag=10

Grateful for @realDonaldTrump’s leadership in providing support to Texas & granting Governor Abbott’s request for a Federal Disaster Declaration following #Imelda’s landfall. —> https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefings-statements/president-donald-j-trump-approves-texas-disaster-declaration-5/

Fannie Lou Hamer was born on this day in 1917. She fought for our civil rights but, also, for our humanity. Ms. Hamer knew it was necessary to fight for what was right, even if she had to so alone. We must continue her tireless and courageous fight each and every day.

It’s disgusting that the Trump administration is arguing in favor of discrimination. We need an administration that will fight to protect LGBTQ+ rights. https://twitter.com/ACLU/status/1180222634853838848 QT @ACLU In case you haven't heard: We're at the Supreme Court on Tuesday. It'll go down as one of the most important days in LGBTQ legal history. @chasestrangio explains. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1180222254875066368/img/7jNMWXCJWZ4hzY_t.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1180222254875066368/vid/480x270/jNU5VrKAzXbnaU2F.mp4?tag=13

These whistleblowers must be protected from intimidation and harassment by the president and his Administration.
https://twitter.com/Newsweek/status/1180842197530353665 QT @Newsweek A 2nd whistleblower claims to have firsthand information about Trump's election dealings with Ukraine https://www.newsweek.com/second-whistleblower-ukraine-donald-trump-mark-zaid-attorney-election-firsthand-knowledge-1463428?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=Social&utm_campaign=NewsweekTwitter

We set an ambitious goal: 1,000,000 calls to early states in 10 days. It took our volunteers just nine.

This is the unprecedented grassroots power that we need to not only defeat Donald Trump, but to take back our democracy from the corporate elite. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGNOBdSWkAEGe1T.jpg

This weekend in South Carolina, I met Caroline, who's running for 8th grade class president. Young leaders like her inspire me every day. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGOPBC1WsAIQfuJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1180943780846997505/vid/320x320/CQY4y-hqhZXgHeLd.mp4?tag=13

Joshua Brown’s selflessness and courage brought some justice for his neighbor Botham Jean. We grieve again learning of Joshua’s murder.

I pray for his family, his community, and all those impacted by this tragedy.  

We demand answers.

As a lifelong @HoustonRockets fan, I was proud to see @dmorey call out the Chinese Communist Party’s repressive treatment of protestors in Hong Kong.

Now, in pursuit of big $$, the @nba is shamefully retreating. https://twitter.com/sopandeb/status/1181006820372025344 QT @SopanDeb NEW: the NBA has released a statement on Daryl Morey: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGPHcIkWkAAgfE5.jpg

I joined my colleagues in Congress on an amicus brief to the Supreme Court in support of DACA. Dreamers are woven into the fabric of our country, & they belong here. @realDonaldTrump was wrong – legally & morally – to target this deeply important program. https://twitter.com/americasvoice/status/1180194225134211072 QT @AmericasVoice In light of the Supreme Court beginning its new term next week, @SenatorDurbin and @RepZoeLofgren filed a bipartisan amicus brief in support of DACA.
https://americasvoice.org/press_releases/bipartisan-amicus-brief-filed-in-support-of-daca/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGDkZMhXYAAPqx_.jpg

I’m with you all the way! My plan to return power to working people will expand the right to unionize to even more workers. When unions win, all workers win. #UnionsForAll http://ewar.ren/labor-tw https://twitter.com/SEIU/status/1180593602868604928 QT @SEIU WE'RE LOUD 🗣️& PROUD ✊🏾✊🏿✊🏼! 
Over 1,000 SEIU members & working people from across the country have joined together at the #UnionsForAll Summit. We're calling on 2020 candidates to have a plan to give every worker the opportunity to join a union, no matter where we work. @ewarren http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGJPnofU0AEgdpx.jpg

Americans will lose trust in our judicial system if they no longer believe that our judges will be held to the highest ethical standards. 

Like the man who appointed him, Brett Kavanaugh should be impeached. #ReclaimTheCourt https://twitter.com/PPact/status/1180877374721789952 QT @PPact People need to be able to trust the Supreme Court will protect their fundamental rights and freedoms. That’s why we’re mobilizing to #ReclaimTheCourt!

A year later, this remains painfully true: the investigation into Kavanaugh was inadequate, failing not only Christine Blasey Ford, but millions of survivors. Said it a year ago and I’ll say it again: right, forever vigilant, is always stronger than wrong, temporarily victorious.

RT @RepAdamSchiff It's appalling that an American reporter was harassed by a federal employee while reentering our country, and it’s happened before. This must be investigated and corrective action taken.

Reporters aren’t the enemy of the people, they’re a foundation of our democracy. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1180341454306250752 QT @washingtonpost Journalist says a CBP officer withheld his passport until he agreed he writes "propaganda" https://trib.al/h9qQ4mW
